overview: Larry Semon produces his take on a typical Keystone farce, the flirting-in-the-park routine, where pretty Florence Curtis is pursued by four typical Keystone types: the wealthy geezer, the moustachioed Italian, the derby-wearing tough and, of course, the big-footed copâ€¦ and here comes Larry, if not to save the day, at least to make us laugh.
title: Plagues And Puppy Love
